name: Jumping
description: When you take the Jump action, you make a Strength (Athletics) check and cover a number of feet up to the check's total (Long Jump) or one-quarter that total (High Jump, minimum 1 foot). Each foot cleared on a jump costs a foot of movement. If you spend no movement before jumping, the distances are halved. If you land in Difficult Terrain, you must make a DC 10 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or have the Prone condition.
